text: ame dareka manavine potana matapita sathe sadavartana karavano adesa apyo, ham! Jo te'o allaha sathe ko'ine bhagidara theravavano adesa ape, jenum tamane jnana nathi, to temanum kahyum na mano. Tamare sau'e mari tarapha ja pacha pharavanum che, pachi hum te dareka vastuni jana apisa je tame karata hatam
